Translations.Text: alif-lam-ra kitabun uh'kimat ayatuhu thumma fussilat min ladun hakimin khabirin
alla taʿbudu illa l-laha innani lakum min'hu nadhirun wabashirun
wa-ani is'taghfiru rabbakum thumma tubu ilayhi yumattiʿ'kum mataʿan hasanan ila ajalin musamman wayu'ti kulla dhi fadlin fadlahu wa-in tawallaw fa-inni akhafu ʿalaykum ʿadhaba yawmin kabirin
ila l-lahi marjiʿukum wahuwa ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
ala innahum yathnuna sudurahum liyastakhfu min'hu ala hina yastaghshuna thiyabahum yaʿlamu ma yusirruna wama yuʿ'linuna innahu ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
wama min dabbatin fi l-ardi illa ʿala l-lahi riz'quha wayaʿlamu mus'taqarraha wamus'tawdaʿaha kullun fi kitabin mubinin

wahuwa alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin wakana ʿarshuhu ʿala l-mai liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu ʿamalan wala-in qul'ta innakum mabʿuthuna min baʿdi l-mawti layaqulanna alladhina kafaru in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
wala-in akharna ʿanhumu l-ʿadhaba ila ummatin maʿdudatin layaqulunna ma yahbisuhu ala yawma yatihim laysa masrufan ʿanhum wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
